subject: A New Show I wanted to Share
author: ghuny1
full_text:
Hi All,
I have some wonderful friends in the Paranormal I wanted to share 
with all of you to check out. They keep up with this forum with Misty 
and Ratka and Frank Sumption whom they adore !!!
Here are the links to view..I hope all of you will enjoy!

Here are links for all episodes so far :)

Blessings, Laura
